contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Cerveza Xibeca botella vidrio 1l.jpg|thumb|180 px|Xibeca: 1-litre bottle]] [[Image:Xibeca Cervesa Damm Llauna.jpg|thumb|180 px|A can of Xibeca beer]] '''Xibeca''' or Xibeca-Damm, is a [[Catalonia|Catalan]] [[beer]] brand of [[Barcelona]] brewery [[S.A. Damm]], produced and mostly sold in its home [[Catalonia|Catalan]] market. It is a low-alcohol grade, pale lager-style, table-beer coming in large one-liter bottles. "Xibeca" was meant to be consumed along with meals, as a cheap substitute for red table [[red wine|wine]] when the prices of table wines rose at the end of the 1960s. It was very popular among the low-middle class in Catalonia during the 1970s. Damm is one of the main breweries in [[Barcelona]]. During the heyday of [[baseball]] in Spain in the 1950s and 1960s, S.A. Damm sponsored a local baseball team, [[Picadero Damm]]. Other Damm products include [[Estrella Damm]] and [[Voll-Damm]]. ==References== *[http://www.damm.cat/wps/portal/webdamm/!ut/p/c5/04_SB8K8xLLM9MSSzPy8xBz9CP0os_hARx93Jw_n4ABTE6OQAEf3UC8DKADKR5rFe_iEhPgbBge4OZu4Bjv5mvuaGcLk8esOB9mHXz9I3gAHcDTQ9_PIz03Vj9SPMo8PMnbytnAydDTw93U2MfAMdvM3NHECKTPVj8xJTU9MrtQvyI0wyDIJVQQABv6axQ!!/dl3/d3/L0lJSklna2shL0lCakFBTXlBQkVSQ0lBISEvWUZOQzFOS18yN3chLzdfUjNCSzhCMUEwT01DNDBJU0ZPMTRCMDAwMDU!/?WCM_PORTLET=PC_7_R3BK8B1A0OMC40ISFO14B00005001452_WCM&WCM_GLOBAL_CONTEXT=/wps/wcm/connect/migratewcm_1/en/WebPublica/CervezasDamm/Xibeca Xibeca at the Damm site (in English)] *[http://www.ratebeer.com/beer/damm-xibeca/9530/ Beer Rate] [[Category:Beer and breweries in Spain]] {{beer-stub}}
